title: 旧约 - 诗篇(Psalms) - 第 95 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 诗篇(Psalms) -- 第 95 章 ( 本篇共有 150 章 )

lineList.en: O come, let us sing unto the LORD: let us make a joyful noise to the rock of our salvation.
lineList.cn: 来阿，我们要向耶和华歌唱，向拯救我们的磐石欢呼。

lineList.en: Let us come before his presence with thanksgiving, and make a joyful noise unto him with psalms.
lineList.cn: 我们要来感谢他，用诗歌向他欢呼。

lineList.en: For the LORD is a great God, and a great King above all gods.
lineList.cn: 因耶和华为大神，为大王，超乎万神之上。

lineList.en: In his hand are the deep places of the earth: the strength of the hills is his also.
lineList.cn: 地的深处在他手中。山的高峰也属他。

lineList.en: The sea is his, and he made it: and his hands formed the dry land.
lineList.cn: 海洋属他。是他造的。旱地也是他手造成的。

lineList.en: O come, let us worship and bow down: let us kneel before the LORD our maker.
lineList.cn: 来阿，我们要屈身敬拜，在造我们的耶和华面前跪下。

lineList.en: For he is our God; and we are the people of his pasture, and the sheep of his hand. To day if ye will hear his voice,
lineList.cn: 因为他是我们的神。我们是他草场的羊，是他手下的民。惟愿你们今天听他的话。

lineList.en: Harden not your heart, as in the provocation, and as in the day of temptation in the wilderness:
lineList.cn: 你们不可硬着心，像当日在米利巴，就是在旷野的玛撒。

lineList.en: When your fathers tempted me, proved me, and saw my work.
lineList.cn: 那时你们的祖宗试我探我，并且观看我的作为。

lineList.en: Forty years long was I grieved with this generation, and said, It is a people that do err in their heart, and they have not known my ways:
lineList.cn: 四十年之久，我厌烦那世代，说，这是心里迷糊的百姓，竟不晓得我的作为。

lineList.en: Unto whom I sware in my wrath that they should not enter into my rest.
lineList.cn: 所以我在怒中起誓，说，他们断不可进入我的安息。
